questionText.text:
Implement a feature for the sudoku solver puzzle that we implemented upto yesterday. The following is the feature you need to implement

In the above example including rows columns and individual squares the two diagonal numbers also unique.

Implement the above required feature for the code and do a screencast by explaining the changes you done in the code and show the output also in the screencast
